nodes.text: The Ghrag Mercenaries were one of the many enemies of the Civilian Protection Guild, particularly of Eyma, one of its members, on the Wookiee homeworld of Kashyyyk. They had a base in the Tyyyn Nebula. In 1 ABY, the Ghrag stole a CR90 corvette from the Civilian Protection Agency. It was soon recaptured from them by a group of spacers that had been sent by Eyma.

The Ghrag Mercenaries appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
